Fairy Magic.description: You know the druidcraft cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the faerie fire spell with this trait. Starting at 5th level, you can also cast the enlarge/reduce spell with this trait. Once you cast faerie fire or enlarge/reduce with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast either of those spells using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Wisdom is spellcasting mod.

Flight.name: Flight
Flight.description: Because of your wings, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. You can't use this flying speed if you're wearing medium or heavy armor.

Alpha Predator.name: Alpha Predator
Alpha Predator.description:
Passive, AP reduction
When wildshaped, the form Cookie takes has the following bonuses: 
A bonus to saving throws equal to her wisdom modifier.

Cat’s Tongue.name: Cat’s Tongue
Cat’s Tongue.description: You have proficiency in the Performance and Persuasion skills, and you can speak fluently to felines.

Feline Agility.name: Feline Agility
Feline Agility.description: Your reflexes and agility allow you to move with a burst of speed. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the tum. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

Feline Evasiveness.name: Feline Evasiveness
Feline Evasiveness.description: Your quick thinking and dexterous movements allow you to avoid enemy attacks. When you move, you can use a bonus action to not provoke attacks of opportunity for the rest of the turn. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

Dagger Of Truth.name: Dagger Of Truth
Dagger Of Truth.description: Relic, a person you are not allied with, stabbed with this dagger can only tell the truth till long rest, if they answer a yes or no question or anything of the sort, they must follow through with it. Can be used twice a day. {@damage 1d4+6}

Teleport Crystal.name: Teleport Crystal
Teleport Crystal.description: This crystal can be used to teleport to way stones in different areas. Needs to be charged up with magic before use. Up to 4 people can come along. 1MP per person.

Whip Sword.name: Whip Sword
Whip Sword.description: Reach of 10ft, starts as a sword, when whipped the segments break apart to strike. {@damage 1d8+2}

Absorption.name: Absorption
Absorption.description:
When you have contact with a magic item, attack, or spell, you may roll a Dice depending on the level of the spell. If you roll a 1 on the d4 you absorb the magic and gain an amount of MP the amount equal to the spell level. You may absorb Magic 5 times per long rest and may attempt to absorb every 7 seconds (1 round in combat). {@absorb}
{@Choice} Lvl 1: 1 on a d4
{@Choice} Lvl 2: 1 on a d6
{@Choice} Lvl 3: 1 on a d8
{@Choice} Lvl 4: 1 on a d10
{@Choice} Lvl 5: 1 on a d12
{@Choice} Lvl 6: 1 on a d14
{@Choice} Lvl 7: 1 on a d16
{@Choice} Lvl 8: 1 on a d18
{@Choice} Lvl 9: 1 on a d20

MP Usage.name: MP Usage
MP Usage.description:
On a successful hit you may spend the MP to add an additional +2 to your total damage. UPGRADE - You can infuse MP into Objects and people, restoring items and making others stronger. (MP amount gives spell slot back or amount of hp for nonspell casters) {@absorb}
{@Choice} 1MP: 1st Lvl Slot or 1d4 healing
{@Choice} 2MP: 2nd Lvl Slot or 1d6 healing
{@Choice} 3MP: 3rd Lvl Slot or 1d8 healing
{@Choice} 4MP: 4th Lvl Slot or 1d10 healing
{@Choice} 5MP: 5th Lvl Slot or 1d12 healing
{@Choice} 6MP: 6th Lvl Slot or 1d14 healing
{@Choice} 7MP: 7th Lvl Slot or 1d16 healing
{@Choice} 8MP: 8th Lvl Slot or 1d18 healing
{@Choice} 9MP: 91h Lvl Slot or 1d20 healing

Heavy Crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
Heavy Crossbow.desc: Heavy: {@damage 1d10+(Dexterity)} Ammunition, range (100/400), heavy, loading, two-handed {+(Dexterity&Proficiceny)toHit

Ghostly Beginings.description: Your ghost infusion grants you many benefits, and drawbacks. The more stronger this side of you get, the less control of your body you have. By unlocking this skill you gain resistance to Cold & Necrotic. You also gain Ghost Mode, an active ability by using an action your ghostly side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Ghost Mode you gain the ability to levitate (While on the ground) you can float up to 10 feet off the ground, and can see up too 60 feet in the Ethereal Plane. Ghost mode can be used as much times as you have proficiency bonus. For these benefits you gain 15% Infusion Rate, once you hit 100% you will become permanently your chosen animal/beast forever. When in an interaction that may have your infused side wanting to do something, you must roll a d100 if you roll above your Infusion Rate you resist that action.
Ghostly Beginings.name: Ghostly Beginings

By unlocking this skill you gain resistance to Cold & Necrotic. You also gain Ghost Mode, an active ability by using an action your ghostly side grows temporally (10 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Ghost Mode you gain the ability to levitate (While on the ground) you can float up to 10 feet off the ground, and can see up too 60 feet in the Ethereal Plane, with darkvisoin in both for 60 as well. Ghost mode can be used as much times as you have proficiency bonus. For these benefits you gain 15% Infusion Rate, once you hit 100% you will become permanently your chosen animal/beast forever. When in an interaction that may have your infused side wanting to do something, you must roll a d100 if you roll above your Infusion Rate you resist that action.
Ghostly Beginings (10 Turns).name: Ghostly Beginings (10 Turns)

Ghost Phasing.description: Like other ghost being able to travel through objects and people, with this upgrade you can as well. While in Ghost mode for an action, you are able to move through any solid (non-moving) object/people as long as it is less then 3 feet wide. Your physical body can't go beyond this amount, at least with this much Infusion Rate.
Ghost Phasing.name: Ghost Phasing

Improved Ghost Phasing.description: By unlocking this your Ghost Mode phasing can go up to 5 feet in depth instead of the normal 3ft. As an extra benefit you are able to phase through moving things now as well.
Improved Ghost Phasing.name: Improved Ghost Phasing

Ghost Wildshape.description: By having your ghostly side take over majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a ghost (Using Ghost D&D 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. You can stay a ghost for up to 5 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 10 minutes before using the ability again, as your ghost side needs time to recharge.
Ghost Wildshape.name: Ghost Wildshape

Enhanced Ghost Wildshape.description: By having your ghostly side take over majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a ghost (Using Ghost D&D 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a ghost for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your ghost side needs time to recharge.
Enhanced Ghost Wildshape.name: Enhanced Ghost Wildshape

Ghostly Possession.description: By unlocking this you are now able to possess people and items while in Ghost Mode. A humanoid must succeed on a D13 Charisma saving through, or be possessed by you. Your body fuses into your target and you can pilot the person, you keep your Int, Wis, & Char, but don't gain access to target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. Once the target's HP drop to 0, or you end on bonus action you are kicked out of the target. When possessing objects, you are able to hear, smell, see, and feel what is around you. You can also vibrate or manipulate objects if they are designed to do so (Flipping a lever, pushing a button).
Ghostly Possession.name: Ghostly Possession

Improved Ghostly Levitation.description: By unlocking this your levitation from your Ghost Mode goes up to a full 40 feet and can be activated while midair. For these benefits you gain 10% more Infusion Rate.
Improved Ghostly Levitation.name: Improved Ghostly Levitation

Ghostly Etherealness.description: While in Ghost Mode, you can positions your body in between both Material plane and Ethereal Plane for an action. While in between the two realms you are visible on both planes, yet you can't affect either and they can't affect you. You can regain full access to material plane at any time, or forcefully when Ghost Mode ends.
Ghostly Etherealness.name: Ghostly Etherealness

Quicker Ferret Action.name: Quicker Ferret Action
Quicker Ferret Action.description: Your extra bonus action while in Ferret Mode can be an action or bonus action instead.

Longer Ferret Nap.name: Longer Ferret Nap
Longer Ferret Nap.description: With your infusion being a big part of you now, longer naps (short rest & long rest) do more healing. By going into Ferret Mode before the rest, you will roll a {@sDice 1d2}. On a one you will heal 1.5 the amount of hp you would for the rest. On a two you will gain the normal hp & 1/2 of the hp that was healed as Temp Hp.

Quicken Ferret Action.name: Quicken Ferret Action
Quicken Ferret Action.description: With unlocking this, you can turn something that would take an action into a bonus action instead. You can do this once a turn while in ferret mode.

Improved Pixiu Protection.name: Improved Pixiu Protection
Improved Pixiu Protection.description: By unlocking this your Pixiu protection goes from splitting the damage in half between you and your bound to you taking 1/2 and them taking 1/4 of the total damage. For these benefits, you gain 10% more Infusion Rate.

Pixiu's Bounded Pact.name: Pixiu's Bounded Pact
Pixiu's Bounded Pact.description: While in Pixiu mode and bound to a person, your connection will grow stronger with this ability. You and your bond are so connected that any that would affect them will also affect you as well. For example, any healing you gain will heal the same to them as well. This works for bad things as well. If they are put to sleep from a spell you are put to sleep as well until they wake up or your Pixiu Mode expires you will remain in that state. Any active or passive effects will affect the two of you. (Damage taken by any party isn’t shared) You also will gain the ability to telepathically speak to one another within 30 feet of each other.

Improved Pixiu Pact.name: Improved Pixiu Pact
Improved Pixiu Pact.description: While in Pixiu mode and bound to a person, your connection will grow stronger with this ability. You and your bond are so connected that any that would affect them will also affect you as well. For example, any healing you gain will heal the same to them as well. This applies only to benefits deemed as positive. Any active or passive effects will affect the two of you. You also will gain the ability to telepathically speak to one another within 30 feet of each other. With this connection, you both can now share stats from Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma. Being that they are giving you the knowledge/advice from their experiences.

Pixiu Wildshape.name: Pixiu Wildshape
Pixiu Wildshape.description: By having your Pixiu side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wild shape into a Pixiu (Using Pixiu 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. You can stay a Pixiu for up to 5 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 10 minutes before using the ability again, as your Pixiu side needs time to recharge.

Enhanced Pixiu Wildshape.name: Enhanced Pixiu Wildshape
Enhanced Pixiu Wildshape.description: By having your Pixiu side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wild shape into a Pixiu (Using Pixiu 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a Pixiu for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your Pixiu side needs time to recharge.

Pixiu's Hunger for Riches.name: Pixiu's Hunger for Riches
Pixiu's Hunger for Riches.description: In Pixiu Mode, eating gold will heal you, eating silver will make you more durable, and eating copper will make you more strong for some time. These effects also apply to your bounded pact. For coins, you must eat 5 of them to gain their effect. Eating more will increase duration or impact. (Gold every 5 coins heals you 2d8 + 3 + Proficiency), (Silver every 5 coins gives you temp hp of 2d8 + 3 + Proficiency. Temp Hp given this way can stack), (Copper 5 coins give you +2d6 + 3 + Proficiency more damage on attacks and increases your strength stat by 4 for 1 minute per 5 coins)

Pixiu's Multipact.name: Pixiu's Multipact
Pixiu's Multipact.description: You can bind to 2 people now instead of one in Pixiu Mode. You can choose to be bound to one or two, to change your bindings you will still use a bonus action. If you have Pixiu’s Bound Pact unlocked you are all linked to one another, they can borrow stats and communicate between themselves or you. You can all three discuss in your mind group chat, and things that affect one of you affect the other two as well. You also now share resistances and proficiencies as well.

Basilisk's Eyes.name: Basilisk's Eyes
Basilisk's Eyes.description: By unlocking this skill you gain immunity to poison and advantage on Constitution saving throws. You also gain Basilisk Mode, an active ability by using an action your Basilisk side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Basilisk Mode you can use an action to do a petrifying stare on creatures looking at you (in a fight this would include anyone fighting you directly, not in a fight anyone who is talking to you would be implied to be looking at you in the eyes. This ability also works on yourself if you see your own eyes). The being must be within 10 feet of you, then they must save on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw {@save}. If they fail, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a second failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. You also will gain 30 feet of dark vision in this form. Basilisk mode can be used as many times as you have proficiency bonus.

Basilisk's Eyes (10 turns).name: Basilisk's Eyes
Basilisk's Eyes (10 turns).description: By unlocking this skill you gain immunity to poison and advantage on Constitution saving throws. You also gain Basilisk Mode, an active ability by using an action your Basilisk side grows temporally (10 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Basilisk Mode you can use an action to do a petrifying stare on creatures looking at you (in a fight this would include anyone fighting you directly, not in a fight anyone who is talking to you would be implied to be looking at you in the eyes. This ability also works on yourself if you see your own eyes). The being must be within 10 feet of you, then they must save on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw {@save}. If they fail, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is restrained. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a second failure, the creature is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic. You also will gain 60 feet of dark vision in this form. Basilisk mode can be used as many times as you have proficiency bonus.

Improved Basilisk Vision.name: Improved Basilisk Vision
Improved Basilisk Vision.description: By unlocking this your Basilisk petrifying stare goes from 10 feet from you to 30 feet where your locking eyes can turn them to stone.

Basilisk's Venom.name: Basilisk's Venom
Basilisk's Venom.description: The venom from a basilisk is one of the most deadly venoms in the world. Once this venom is inside of a being there is little to do to cure it without magic. Of course, you are immune to this venom, the only way for you to deploy this is through your teeth. While in Basilisk mode you gain the Basilisk Bite ability, doing {@damage 1d10+3} damage on a hit. This will then infect the target, doing {@sDice 2d6+2} on each of their turns of poison damage.

Stronger Basilisk Venom.name: Stronger Basilisk Venom
Stronger Basilisk Venom.description: The venom from a basilisk is one of the most deadly venoms in the world. Once this venom is inside of a being there is little to do to cure it without magic. Of course, you are immune to this venom, the only way for you to deploy this is through your teeth. While in Basilisk mode you gain the Basilisk Bite ability, doing {@damage 2d10+6} damage on a hit. This will then infect the target, doing {@sDice 3d6+4} on each of their turns of poison damage.

Basilisk Wildshape.name: Basilisk Wildshape
Basilisk Wildshape.description: By having your Basilisk side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Basilisk (Using Basilisk 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. You can stay a Basilisk for up to 5 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 10 minutes before using the ability again, as your Basilisk side needs time to recharge.

Enhanced Basilisk Wildshape.name: Enhanced Basilisk Wildshape
Enhanced Basilisk Wildshape.description: By having your Basilisk side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Basilisk (Using Basilisk 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a Basilisk for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your Basilisk side needs time to recharge.

Basilisk's Fire Breath.name: Basilisk's Fire Breath
Basilisk's Fire Breath.description: Basilisk are also known for their burning hot fire breath. While in Basilisk mode you can use your bonus action to do a fire breath attack. This travels in a line from you for 10 feet. Any creature in this line rolls a DC 13 dexterity saving throw. On a failed save they take {@save 3d6+2} fire damage, or half damage on a success.

Basilisk Dripping Venom.name: Basilisk Dripping Venom
Basilisk Dripping Venom.description: With this unlocked, you can now make your teeth drip its venom in Basilisk mode. This can be collected and used to coat weapons, poured into food, or anything you wish. Once this venom is inside a person it will do its normal damage decided from Basilisk Venom's ability. If this ability is still locked it will do {@sDice 1d6} poison damage a turn, this is incurable by normal means. Only magic can end its effects.

Vampire Squid's Light.name: Vampire Squid's Light
Vampire Squid's Light.description: Your Vampire Squid infusion grants you many benefits and drawbacks. The stronger this side of you gets, the less control of your body you have. By unlocking this skill you gain resistance to Cold and can breathe underwater with the help of your gills. You also gain Vampire Squid Mode, an active ability by using an action your Vampire Squid side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Vampire Squid Mode you can use a bonus action to make the ends of your tentacles glow in any color you choose, creating 15 feet of light from each. You can also use your action to have your tentacles grab and try to grapple someone within 5 feet of you. The target will do an athletics {@skill Athletics} save {@save}, they must beat your (athletics + lv + proficiency) DC. If they don’t they are grappled for the turn. On their next turn, they can use their action to try and break out again. Also while in Vampire Squid Mode you will have darkvision up to 30ft. Vampire Squid mode can be used as many times as you have proficiency bonus.

Vampire Squid's Light (10 turns).name: Vampire Squid's Light (10 turns)
Vampire Squid's Light (10 turns).description: Your Vampire Squid infusion grants you many benefits and drawbacks. The stronger this side of you gets, the less control of your body you have. By unlocking this skill you gain resistance to Cold and can breathe underwater with the help of your gills. You also gain Vampire Squid Mode, an active ability by using an action your Vampire Squid side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Vampire Squid Mode you can use a bonus action to make the ends of your tentacles glow in any color you choose, creating 15 feet of light from each. You can also use your action to have your tentacles grab and try to grapple someone within 5 feet of you. The target will do an athletics {@skill Athletics} save {@save}, they must beat your (athletics + lv + proficiency) DC. If they don’t they are grappled for the turn. On their next turn, they can use their action to try and break out again. Also while in Vampire Squid Mode you will have darkvision up to 60ft. Vampire Squid mode can be used as many times as you have proficiency bonus.

Improved Vampire Squid Grapple.name: Improved Vampire Squid Grapple
Improved Vampire Squid Grapple.description: By unlocking this your Vampire Squid Mode grapple can be used as a bonus action instead of an action. The DC stays at (athletics + lv + proficiency) {@skill Athletics} {@save}. As a bonus, you gain a swim speed of 30ft in Vampire Squid Mode.

Vampire Squid Bioluminescence Mucus.name: Vampire Squid Bioluminescence Mucus
Vampire Squid Bioluminescence Mucus.description: Like the vampire squid, you too can create a bioluminescence mucus cloud, after unlocking this ability you can use your action in Vampire Squid Mode to spit this mucus on someone within 5ft of you. This mucus will restrain the creature for {@sDice 1d4+1} turns before it starts to dissolve.

Improved Vampire Squid Mucus.name: Improved Vampire Squid Mucus
Improved Vampire Squid Mucus.description: By unlocking this your Vampire Squid Mucus can now reach 10 feet from you and restrain the creature for {@sDice 2d4+3} turns instead of the 1d4 + 1.

Vampire Squid Wildshape.name: Vampire Squid Wildshape
Vampire Squid Wildshape.description: By having your Vampire Squid side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Vampire Squid (Using Vampire Squid 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. Enhanced Vampire Squid Wildshape.name: Enhanced Vampire Squid Wildshape
Enhanced Vampire Squid Wildshape.description: By having your Vampire Squid side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Vampire Squid (Using Vampire Squid 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a Vampire Squid for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your Vampire Squid side needs time to recharge.

Vampire Squid's Teeth.name: Vampire Squid's Teeth
Vampire Squid's Teeth.description: Vampire Squid are known for inverting itself inside out revealing their teeth. You can do this as well. But instead of your mouth, your tentacles will invert revealing teeth. When using a bonus action in Vampire Squid Mode, you can invert them giving you a temporary increase to your AC the increase is by your proficiency modifier and will last till your Vampire Squid mode runs out. If any creature attacks miss they will take {@sDice 2d4+2} damage from hitting your teeth.

Vampire Squid Regeneration.name: Vampire Squid Regeneration
Vampire Squid Regeneration.description: Vampire Squid are known for the regeneration of their arms. You too can gain this ability, while in Vampire Squid Mode at the start of each of your turns, you may roll {@damage 2d4+2} and regain that amount of health.

Hydra’s More The Merrier.name: Hydra’s More The Merrier
Hydra’s More The Merrier.description: Your Hydra infusion grants you many benefits and drawbacks. By unlocking this skill you gain an advantage on Charm and frighten checks, but gain a weakness to fire. You also gain Hydra Mode, an active ability by using an action your Hydra side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Hydra Mode when you take 15 points of damage, you will grow a temporary head from the point of impact. Each head you grow will heal you 5 hp. Each of your heads will get a reaction action to bite the nearest creature when walking by dealing a 1d10+proficency bonus {@damage 1d10+3} {+3toHit} with proficiency being added to the accuracy roll. Once the head successfully deals damage or your Hydra mode runs out, the head will dissipate. Also while in Hydra Mode you will have darkvision up to 30ft. Hydra mode can be used as many times as you have proficiency bonus.

Longer Hydra Mode.name: Longer Hydra Mode
Longer Hydra Mode.description: By unlocking this your Hydra Mode ability will be able to be held for 10 turns instead of the normal 5. As a bonus, you also get 60 feet of darkvision instead of 30.

Improved Hydra Threshold.name: Hydra’s Extra Head
Improved Hydra Threshold.description: By unlocking this your Hydra Mode threshold to grow a head goes from 15 to 10 hp lost. As a bonus, your heads now are able to try and bite during your turn. They still can do reaction and will die after dealing damage.

Hydra’s Extra Head.name: Hydra’s Extra Head
Hydra’s Extra Head.description: Like the Hydra, you too will have another permanent head. This head will add 5hp to your max hp. You can have one of the heads resting while the other is awake. Allowing you to be awake during long rest. (Long/short rest benefits will only apply if you are not moving around) While in Hydra Mode, you can use your own reaction to bite the nearest creature when walking by dealing a 1d10+proficency bonus {@damage 1d10+3} {+3toHit} with proficiency being added to the accuracy roll. This head will remain after making a successful attack.

Improved Hydra Extra Head.name: Improved Hydra Extra Head
Improved Hydra Extra Head.description: Your extra head will be able to be used as a bonus action or a reaction while in Hydra Mode. Your extra head gives you 10 max hp instead of the normal 5.

Hydra Wildshape.name: Hydra Wildshape
Hydra Wildshape.description: By having your Hydra side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Hydra (Using Hydra 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. You can stay a Vampire Squid for up to 5 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 10 minutes before using the ability again, as your Hydra side needs time to recharge.

Enhanced Hydra Wildshape.name: Enhanced Hydra Wildshape
Enhanced Hydra Wildshape.description: By having your Hydra side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Hydra (Using Hydra 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a Vampire Squid for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your Hydra side needs time to recharge.

Hydra Breathless.name: Hydra Breathless
Hydra Breathless.description: Hydra's are also able to hold their breaths for a long time. With this unlocked, you can do this as well. If you have one head you can hold your breath for 30 minutes, but if you have 2 heads you can hold it for 60 minutes.

Hydra Venomous Bite.name: Hydra Venomous Bite
Hydra Venomous Bite.description: Some Hydra's have venom going through their breaths or bite. You too can gain this ability, while in Hydra Mode your bite attack goes to dealing a 1d10+proficency bonus with an extra 2d8+5 acid damage with proficiency being added to the accuracy roll. {@damage 1d10+3} {+3toHit} {@sDice 2d8+5}

Ice Try.name: Ice Try
Ice Try.description: This ability can be used as much as you have a proficiency bonus. As a reaction to getting hit, you will expand the cold within your chest plate, this cold will travel to the one who hit you within 5 feet. This cold will freeze the opponent for 1 turn rotation skipping their next turn.

Scorpion Pointy Tail.name: Scorpion Pointy Tail
Scorpion Pointy Tail.description: Your Scorpion infusion grants you many benefits and drawbacks. The stronger this side of you gets, the less control of your body you have. By unlocking this skill you gain 15ft of Blindsight, allowing you to sense invisible creatures around you. You also gain Scorpion Mode, an active ability by using an action your Scorpion side grows temporally (5 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Scorpion Mode, you gain the ability to use your tail to sting someone using your proficiency and dex to hit. On a hit, you will do {@damage 1d10+4} 1d10 + dex piercing damage, and the target must make a dc (10+dex+prof) Constitution saving throw, taking {@save 2d6} poison damage on a fail, or half damage on a success. You are also able to use a bonus action to have your tail eject the poison, this can be collected and used at a later date. Scorpion mode can be used as many times as you have a proficiency bonus.

Scorpion Pointy Tail (10 Turns)l.description: Your Scorpion infusion grants you many benefits and drawbacks. The stronger this side of you gets, the less control of your body you have. By unlocking this skill you gain 25ft of Blindsight, allowing you to sense invisible creatures around you. You also gain Scorpion Mode, an active ability by using an action your Scorpion side grows temporally (10 Turns) to boost your abilities. In Scorpion Mode, you gain the ability to use your tail to sting someone using your proficiency and dex to hit. On a hit, you will do {@damage 1d10+4} 1d10 + dex piercing damage, and the target must make a dc (10+dex+prof) Constitution saving throw, taking {@save 2d6} poison damage on a fail, or half damage on a success. You are also able to use a bonus action to have your tail eject the poison, this can be collected and used at a later date. Scorpion mode can be used as many times as you have a proficiency bonus.

Scorpion Storing Energy.name: Scorpion Storing Energy
Scorpion Storing Energy.description: Like other Scorpions, you can store your energy as well. When you end your turn in Scorpion Mode, any unused action, bonus action, or reaction can be carried over to your next turn for a max of 2 of each. Reactions carried over this way can be used on the same target.

Improved Scorpion Energy Storage.name: Improved Scorpion Energy Storage
Improved Scorpion Energy Storage.description: By unlocking this your Scorpion Mode energy storing can go up to 3 actions, bonus action, and reactions carrying over. As an extra benefit if you didn't move last turn you get an extra 10 ft of movement carrying over.

Scorpion Wildshape.name: Scorpion Wildshape
Scorpion Wildshape.description: By having your Scorpion side take over majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Scorpion (Using Scorpion D&D 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus / 2 (rounded down) times a day. You can stay a Scorpion for up to 5 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 10 minutes before using the ability again, as your Scorpion side needs time to recharge.

Enhanced Scorpion Wildshape.name: Enhanced Scorpion Wildshape
Enhanced Scorpion Wildshape.description: By having your Scorpion side take over the majority of your body you will be able to wildshape into a Scorpion (Using Scorpion D&D 5e Stat Block) for an action, this can be done proficiency bonus times a day. You can stay a Scorpion for up to 10 turns or until your HP drops to 0 (Any overflow will go to your normal hp same as druid) Once unwildshaped, you must wait 5 minutes before using the ability again, as your Scorpion side needs time to recharge.

Resilient Scorpion.name: Resilient Scorpion
Resilient Scorpion.description: By unlocking this you are now able to go through all terrain (except cold environments) without having any speed impact.

Variant Scorpion Poison.name: Variant Scorpion Poison
Variant Scorpion Poison.description: While in Scorpion mode when you use your sting ability you can choose to get a random poison effect. Roll a poison of the injury poison list. {@sDice 1d9} for poison and {@sDice 1d2} for the strength of that poison. You can also collect this poison like your normal poison collection ability.
